title: Love Starved
description: “It all works, and it is so, so satisfying.” —Foreword ReviewsMake me believe it, even if it’s just for one night… Micah Geller considers himself At 27, he has more money than he needs, a job he loves, a debut book coming out and a brilliant career in information security before him. What he doesn’t have is a partner to share it with—a fact that’s never bothered him much.But the romantic in him isn’t entirely dead. When a moment of weakness finds him with a contact to a high class escort specializing in fulfilling fantasies, Micah asks for only one "Show me what it’s like to feel loved."
author: Kate Fierro
